content:
cilium-dbg 
 CLI 
 Synopsis 
 CLI for interacting with the local Cilium Agent 
 Options 
       --config string        Config file (default is $HOME/.cilium.yaml)
  -D, --debug                Enable debug messages
  -h, --help                 help for cilium-dbg
  -H, --host string          URI to server-side API
      --log-driver strings   Logging endpoints to use (example: syslog)
      --log-opt map          Log driver options (example: format=json)
 
 SEE ALSO 
 
 cilium-dbg bgp 	 - Access to BGP control plane 
 cilium-dbg bpf 	 - Direct access to local BPF maps 
 cilium-dbg build-config 	 - Resolve all of the configuration sources that apply to this node 
 cilium-dbg cgroups 	 - Cgroup metadata 
 cilium-dbg completion 	 - Output shell completion code 
 cilium-dbg config 	 - Cilium configuration options 
 cilium-dbg debuginfo 	 - Request available debugging information from agent 
 cilium-dbg encrypt 	 - Manage transparent encryption 
 cilium-dbg endpoint 	 - Manage endpoints 
 cilium-dbg envoy 	 - Manage Envoy Proxy 
 cilium-dbg fqdn 	 - Manage fqdn proxy 
 cilium-dbg identity 	 - Manage security identities 
 cilium-dbg ip 	 - Manage IP addresses and associated information 
 cilium-dbg kvstore 	 - Direct access to the kvstore 
 cilium-dbg loadinfo 	 - Show load information 
 cilium-dbg lrp 	 - Manage local redirect policies 
 cilium-dbg map 	 - Access userspace cached content of BPF maps 
 cilium-dbg metrics 	 - Access metric status 
 cilium-dbg monitor 	 - Display BPF program events 
 cilium-dbg node 	 - Manage cluster nodes 
 cilium-dbg nodeid 	 - List node IDs and associated information 
 cilium-dbg policy 	 - Manage security policies 
 cilium-dbg post-uninstall-cleanup 	 - Remove system state installed by Cilium at runtime 
 cilium-dbg prefilter 	 - Manage XDP CIDR filters 
 cilium-dbg preflight 	 - Cilium upgrade helper 
 cilium-dbg service 	 - List services & loadbalancers 
 cilium-dbg shell 	 - Connect to the Cilium shell 
 cilium-dbg statedb 	 - Dump StateDB contents as JSON 
 cilium-dbg status 	 - Display status of daemon 
 cilium-dbg sysdump 	 - Provide instructions on dumping cluster-wide system state 
 cilium-dbg troubleshoot 	 - Run troubleshooting utilities to check control-plane connectivity 
 cilium-dbg version 	 - Print version information
